com.meta64.mobile.user

Class AccessControlUtil

  • Object
    • AccessControlUtil

  • public class AccessControlUtil
extends Object
    Utility methods for changing access controls on nodes. That is: who can read nodes, modify nodes, delete nodes, etc. Standard access privileges provided by JCR specification. http://jackrabbit.apache.org/oak/docs/security/accesscontrol/editing.html
